headline: Miller Extends Commitment to Breast Cancer Awareness Through Burn & Blossom™ Helmet Sales
summary: APPLETON, Wis., September 29, 2025--Miller Electric Mfg. LLC, a leading worldwide manufacturer of Miller® brand arc welding equipment, announces the return of its collaboration with the Susan G. Komen Foundation in support of Breast Cancer Awareness Month. Throughout October, with every Burn & Blossom helmet sold, a portion of the proceeds will be donated to the foundation.

headline: Why Income Investors View Illinois Tool Works (ITW) as a Value Dividend Stock
summary: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) is included among the 11 Best Value Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) is a leading player in the global industrial manufacturing industry, operating across seven segments that range from automotive components to food service equipment.
